item.title: My Resume
item.description:
name: “Hatice Nur Icen Dinc” location: “Berlin, Germany” summary: > Junior Trade Specialist & Financial Analyst with practical experience in corporate finance, budgeting, and international trade remedies. Developed expertise through hands-on roles in multinational firms, focused on trade defense strategies, credit risk analysis, and financial operations. Currently pursuing a Master’s degree at Freie Universität Berlin.

interests:

  • Trade Remedies
  • Financial Analysis
  • Budgeting
  • International Trade
  • Strategic Planning

experience:
